title: Unable to connect to server after patch
body: Have tryed to log in several times try's a few times then says its unable to connect, my connections fine fire wall is not blocking it etc. Just wondering if any one else is having this issue or is it my computer being annoying

replies.body: Restart your pc before you try changing anything else. A lot of the time it fixes it for reasons beyond science
Yes windows can be a cruel mistress Lol
Scratch all that apparently deleting the lol air client in the rads folder and re-patching fixes just about everything that can go wrong with the client. Strange but that fixed it
Well, good luck :) I've been having my own troubles. None of the classic fixes worked for my problem XD

Might i also add that when i enter task manager i can close the client on my screen but in the task manager its still shown as running and using system memory and it will not allow me to end task. What trickery is this?
Go to control panel > internet options > connections tab > LAN Settings, Uncheck "Proxy Server" and save/relaunch the lol.launcher.admin file
Thank you for taking the time to give a suggestion :) . Gave it a go and "proxy server"was already un checked. I may just do a client repair something may have got corrupted during the update

I'm making a complaint to league of legends oce.... I have recently suffered from this 'bug' and it got me placed in a lower priority queue for 5 games. I have to wait 20 min before each game for your mistake, so please remove it

*RIOT FIX YOUR SERVER ISSUES AND FIX THIS BUG PLEASE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!*
**
YOUR ARE GOING TO START LOOSING PLAYERS CAUSE OF YOUR OWN UNBALANCED THINKING. STOP RELEASING PATCHES VERY OFTEN THAT MIGHT STOP YOUR CUSTOMERS FROM ENJOYING YOUR PRODUCTS.**
